FILE: cm230731v11.0.txt
DYAD: SPAIN-N. KOREA

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171223
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171223

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4451 

TERRMID: MID4451 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4451 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4451 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4451 from Gibler (2018), Spain stopped and inspected a North Korean ship suspected of transporting illegal weapons. Coded not maritime because no boundary was being disputed. 

ISLMID: MID4451 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4451 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4451 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4451 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4451 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4451 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4451
rivalry=230731 nationa=SPAIN nationb=N. KOREA MID4451 20021210-20021211 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Two Spanish warships stopped a North Korean vessel suspected of carrying Scud missiles to Yemen. The Spanish warships escorted the ship to a Yemeni port where it was searched by the US Navy. The ship was released after it was cleared by US officials. First day of dispute was on 12/10/2002 and last day of dispute was on 12/11/2002.

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
